tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE nano_material_inventory (
  material_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  quantity INT,
  supplier VARCHAR(255),
  usage_tracking BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE nano_materials_inventory (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    supplier VARCHAR(255),
    purchase_date DATE
); 

CREATE TABLE material_usage_tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    usage_quantity INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    department VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE usage_tracking (
    tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    quantity_used INT,
    usage_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES nano_materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain (
    shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    quantity_shipped INT,
    ship_date DATE,
    delivery_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES nano_materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE NanoMaterials (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    supplier VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    quantity DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    unit VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE UsageLogs (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    usage_date DATE NOT NULL,
    amount_used DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    employee_id INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Suppliers (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contact_person VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contact_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Employees (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    department VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    designation VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contact_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Materials (material_id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, material_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, quantity INT NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, expiration_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE Suppliers (supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY, supplier_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, contact_person VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE Inventory (inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_id INT NOT NULL, quantity INT NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Materials(material_id))
CREATE TABLE UsageRecords (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_id INT NOT NULL, quantity_used INT NOT NULL, usage_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Materials(material_id))

CREATE TABLE Orders (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, material_id INT NOT NULL, supplier_id INT NOT NULL, quantity_ordered INT NOT NULL, order_date DATE NOT NULL, delivery_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES Materials(material_id), FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id))
